1791 was a momentous year in the history of our countryand its a pretty big deal at the Bill of Rights Institute. That was the year the Bill of Rights was ratified, putting into law rights everyone should enjoy, like freedom of speech, freedom of religion, and due process. What are the perks of joining the 1791 Campaign? When you make your generous gift of $17.91 or more, you will: - Receive a BRI "Celebrating History" 2025 wall calendar. - Be entered first in our drawing for a chance to win BRI merchandise. - Receive a printed copy of BRI's 2024 Annual Report. - Be first to be notified on BRI updates. - Know that you are doing your part to help pass the blessings of liberty to future generations. Join today!  https://lnkd.in/eWfkDJbp  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #1791Campaign
